summary: NOTE: THIS DEFECT APPLIES TO ALL 2017 AND 2017 ENTEGRA ANTHEM MOTORHOMES.    THIS VEHICLE IS MISSING ALL REQUIRED REFLECTORS.  THERE ARE NO REAR REFLEX REFLECTORS, NO REAR SIDE REFLEX REFLECTORS, INTERMEDIATE SIDE REFLEX REFLECTORS, OR FRONT SIDE REFLEX REFLECTORS.  ADDITIONALLY, THE INTERMEDIATE SIDE MARKER LIGHT IS NOT LOCATED AT OR NEAR THE MIDPOINT BETWEEN FRONT AND REAR SIDE MARKERS, BUT INSTEAD IS MOUNTED OVER THE REAR AXLE.    ADDITIONALLY, THE C-SHAPED DAYTIME RUNNING LIGHT CAN EXCEED THE 1.067M MOUNTING HEIGHT WHEN AIRED UP FOR TRAVEL, AND THE DRL WAS NOT DEACTIVATED AS REQUIRED WITH THE HEADLAMP SWITCH IN ANY ON POSITION.
